fields.title: Subscriptions
fields.content: Our services are billed on a subscription basis. By starting a subscription, you agree to recurring monthly charges until you cancel.

fields.title: Cancellations
fields.content: You may cancel your subscription at any time from your account settings. Cancellations take effect at the end of the current billing cycle.

fields.title: Refunds
fields.content: We generally do not offer refunds for partial subscription periods. Refunds are only issued if required by law or in exceptional cases approved by our support team.

fields.title: Failed Payments
fields.content: If a payment fails, access to paid features may be suspended until payment is successfully processed.

fields.title: Contact Us
fields.content: If you have questions about cancellations or refunds, please email us at folderfixteam@gmail.com.
